refnamediv.refpurpose: A command line interface to talk to IPP print servers

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: phpprintipp is a php CLI interface to print servers.
It uses PHP classes located in /usr/share/php/printipp.
Combined together with foomatic-rip, it allows to print to network IPP printers/servers without needing of a spooler on your system.

refsect1.title: RCFILES
refsect1.para: Each server or network printer given by --server myserver needs an rcfile, located (in search order) in: $HOME/.printipp/ $ETC/printipp/ /etc/printipp/
The rcfile format is variable = "value". Blank lines and lines beginning with a "#" are ignored.
refsect1.programlisting:
debug = false // false or 0 to 5 (5 = less verbose)
username = guest password = verysecret // set it if you need authentication
host = "localhost" server_type = CUPS printer = "ipp://localhost:631/printers/reseauipp";
paths = false # => the PrintIPP defaults (CUPS compliant) # example: paths = "/root,/admin,/printers,/jobs"
get_printer_attrs = false print = false get_job_attrs = false port = 631 mediatype = "text/plain" logfile = "/tmp/phpprintipp_log" handle_http_exceptions = true handle_ipp_exceptions = true tempdir = "/tmp"

note.para: rcfiles settings are overriden by command-line options

refsect1.title: EXAMPLES
refsect1.programlisting: echo -e \ 'test\r\nThe quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.\f\0027' | \ phpprintipp -p --server myprinter --mediatype 'text/plain'
